channel.title: Software on W. Kyle Hamilton

item.title: Shiny Apps
item.description: MAVIS (Meta-Analysis via Shiny) is a web application and R package for running a meta-analysis with Shiny and R. Online Demo http://kylehamilton.net/shiny/MAVIS/ aRma aRma is the Turkish version of MAVIS. Burak Aydin at Recep Tayyip ErdoÄŸan University in Rize Turkey translated and maintains this application and part of the MAVIS R package. Online Demo http://kylehamilton.net/shiny/aRma/ lavaan.shiny (Latent Variable Analysis with Shiny) is a Shiny wrapper to the lavaan package. Currently lavaan.
